GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.desciption:: serves a single article object by article_id

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects from an article by article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to an article by article_id, serving the posted comment object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates article by article_id, serving the updated article object
